name: Project Runway
overview: Design It. Make It. Work It. The Project Runway video game puts you in the role of an aspiring fashion designer facing the ultimate competition. Receive your challenge, create your design, choose your model, and perfect her look with hair, make-up, and accessories. Then Make It Work using the Wii Balance Board to strut your stuff on the catwalk. Heidi, Tim, Nina, Michael, and popular Project Runway contestants are all on hand to help you... and to judge you. Features • Star in Project Runway-- the #1 fashion design reality show• Design your own fashion line or tackle unique Project Runway challenges• Create different looks in the hair and makeup studio• Model your own designs on the runway using the Wii Remote and the Wii Balance Board• Select the model perfect for your fashion style• Face celebrity models and designers as mentors and judges• Travel to exotic destinations for a fabulous photo shoot
